mapper.select: SELECT mem_id, mem_password, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email FROM members WHERE 1=1 AND mem_id = #{memId} AND mem_password = #{memPassword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members ( mem_id, mem_password, mem_name, mem_phone, mem_email ) VALUES ( #{memId}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memPhone}, #{memEmail} )
